thread.title: EFCC raids ex-NNPC boss’ home, recovers $9.2m, £72,000
thread.title_full: EFCC raids ex-NNPC boss’ home, recovers $9.2m, £72,000

author: Tony
title: EFCC raids ex-NNPC boss’ home, recovers $9.2m, £72,000
text:
Home » News » EFCC raids ex-NNPC boss’ home, recovers $9.2m, £72,000 EFCC raids ex-NNPC boss’ home, recovers $9.2m, £72,000 On 11:14 pm In News by Tony Comments 
O peratives of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, yesterday, raided the home of a former Group Managing Director of Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation, NNPC, in Kaduna and allegedly recovered $9.2 million in his safe. 
The agents, who also recovered additional £72,000, said it was the largest sum of cash the commission had recovered in recent weeks. 
The former Nigerian National Petroleum Corpora-tion, NNPC, boss had been arraigned by the commission on allegations of money laundering since 2016.
